resources.string: This activity includes all albums of the songs that we have downloaded .
This activity will include the names of all artists whose songs we had saved in the playlist of our app.The name of the artists will be in placed vertical LinearLayout.
This activity includes options like Auto Playlist and All Playlist. These will have all the songs and acan be grouped like last added or recently added.
This activity includes the list of all songs arranged alphabetically in a vertical LinearLayout.

The API that I chose for payment activity is payU.There are two stages of processing payment via payU :-
 1.Customer places an order on our webpage.
 2.PayU confirms that the payment has been processed successfully.
 In the shopping cart the customer clicks on the button that is linked to the the PayU payment service.The PayU system presents an order summary webpage,where the buyer confirms his/her order .Then the buyer accepts the payment on the bank website an finally the system confirms the transaction was successful and thanks the buyer.
